name: quotr
description: Quotr is a [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) [CLI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Command-line_interface)  for getting near real-time stock quotes from [Yahoo Finance](http://finance.yahoo.com/). It works for pretty much every relevant ticker in the world (currently 26.626 symbols across the globe). The delay depends on the Yahoo's data provider.  Normally it's 15 minutes. You can check the list of exchanges and their corresponding delays [here](https://help.yahoo.com/kb/SLN2310.html).
author: Andre Pena
